data.message: Come on Coca Cola lead the way.

replies.message: Hi Zillah, we’ve been involved in the implementation of well-designed deposit schemes around the world and we’ve seen the positive impact they can have. As part of the review of our new strategy we’ve been speaking to consumers and experts and it's clear now is the right time to trial the impact of a small financial incentive can have on the on-the-go packaging recovery rates. For more info check out: http://spr.ly/61838ShQV
